channel.title: Scripting News
channel.description: Scripting News, the weblog started in 1994 that bootstrapped the blogging revolution. ðŸš€

item.description: Escape at Dannemora was worth watching, but it was ungodly slow at times, which I guess is okay because that's how life is in prison, I guess. The Showtime series ended on Sunday.

source:outline.text: Escape at Dannemora was worth watching, but it was ungodly slow at times, which I guess is okay because that's how life is in prison, I guess. The Showtime series ended on Sunday.

item.description: I really need to keep a diary of all the shows I've binge-watched. Until then I'm just going to write about them here on my blog.

source:outline.text: I really need to keep a diary of all the shows I've binge-watched. Until then I'm just going to write about them here on my blog.

item.description: Another full year of Scripting News, in the archive.

source:outline.text: Another full year of Scripting News, in the archive.

item.description: To ring in the New Year, I unsubscribed from all my Zillow emails. I had become addicted to house shopping that way. Learned a lot. Time to focus on other things now.

source:outline.text: To ring in the New Year, I unsubscribed from all my Zillow emails. I had become addicted to house shopping that way. Learned a lot. Time to focus on other things now.
